title: Bug 116829 - Label height does not change with label font modification
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change immediately.
Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a label. 2. Modify the font size of the label. 3. Observe that the label height remains the same.

Observed behavior: The label height does not change when the font size is modified.
Expected behavior: When modifying the font size of a label, the label's height should adjust accordingly.
Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a label. 2. Modify the font size of the label. 3. Observe that the label height is adjusted to match the new font size.
